A prospective randomized double blind phase 3 clinical trial of anti-T lymphocyte globulin (ATLG) to assess impact on chronic graft-versus-host disease (cGVHD) free survival in patients undergoing HLA matched unrelated myeloablative hematopoietic cell transplantation (HCT). Blood. 2016; 128( 22): 505.
